item.title: Embed Video in Green Shoes
item.dc:creator: ashbb
item.content:encoded:
Thanks to J (Jake Kaiden). I could find a solution for embedding a video in Green Shoes app window.

I know there are still many restrictions.
But I could watch or listen various video/audio formats, mp4, avi, wmv, mov, flv, mp3, wav and ogg, on my Windows 7. ;-)

Have fun,
ashbb
